page.title: 16Entertainment & Media.
page.content: { Entertainment.-}In the Woodthorpe, Poolsbrook and Duckmanton area this is very poor. We researched video libraries, Cinemas, Computer Shops, Discos, Pubs and Sports Clubs, there was little of any. We found a few pubs and football, hockey and cricket teams. It would be useful in the future if there were more places of entertainment. { Media.-}Our survey on television programes showed the following to be the most popular programmes:Calendar (local news),various soap operas(eg: Coronation Street, Crossroads and others). Quizes were next followed by comedy and then sports programmes. When asked to choose between watching a play, a film, live sport, the news or a comedy most people chose a film. By CARRIE MATHER & OTHERS.
